00027

00040 // for shared builds
00041 // NOTE: these were useful only when originally the WebUpdate component
00042 //       was built as a library for full integration into the application
00043 //       to update (see the design FAQ in the docs for more info).
00044 #ifdef WXMAKINGDLL_WEBUPDATE
00045     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_WEBUPDATE                               WXEXPORT
00046     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_WEBUPDATE(type)    WXEXPORT type
00047 #elif defined(WXUSINGDLL)
00048     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_WEBUPDATE WXIMPORT
00049     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_WEBUPDATE(type)    WXIMPORT type
00050 #else // not making nor using DLL
00051     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_WEBUPDATE
00052     #define WXDLLIMPEXP_DATA_WEBUPDATE(type)    type
00053 #endif
00054 
00055 #endif // _WX_WEBUPDATE_DEFS_H_
